name: August Infotech
tagline: August Infotech, India based web services provider
description:
August Infotech is client centric, client focused web agency. We work mostly with web agencies from around the world. You can hire us per project or can hire our team on monthly basis.
Our processes are built and fine-tuned to cater to this niche market. We take full responsibility of the projects we do, making sure our clients get peace of mind. We are as easily approachable as your in house staff.
Our proactive approach, commitment to excellence and great customer service makes us different from our competitors. At August Infotech, clients are served to the best with sheer commitment. We love our work & we have a system at place to do it, built with experience of more than 15 years. We believe in delivering right Service with the right technology at the right time.
We ask tons of questions to our clients to gain clear & precise understanding and we attend to every query with zeal to get the best from our team members.
We believe no project is small. Our approach remains same for each project we take, be it small or big.
Every job is done in-house for better control, perfect management & Q point Quality. To achieve that we hire the best in the industry, impart further knowledge & train them to keep updated.
Are you a small company? No worries. We are approachable to you. We have seen many small companies becoming giants. You may be the next.
